headline: Programs and Tools Available to Help FirstEnergy West Virginia Customers Manage Electric Bills
summary: Mon Power and Potomac Edison, subsidiaries of FirstEnergy Corp. (NYSE: FE), are sharing tips, tools and programs to help customers manage their energy use and budget during periods of high demand and all year long.

raw.headline: Programs and Tools Available to Help FirstEnergy West Virginia Customers Manage Electric Bills
raw.summary: Mon Power and Potomac Edison, subsidiaries of FirstEnergy Corp. (NYSE: FE), are sharing tips, tools and programs to help customers manage their energy use and budget during periods of high demand and all year long.

headline: Potomac Edison Provides Maryland Customers Programs and Tools to Manage Electric Bills
summary: Spring is in full swing, a welcome change after this winter's sub-zero temperatures. As spring turns to summer, energy use and costs can often increase as cooling systems work harder to keep homes comfortable. Potomac Edison, a subsidiary of FirstEnergy Corp. (NYSE: FE), is sharing tips and tools to help customers manage their energy use and budget during periods of high demand and all year long.

raw.headline: Potomac Edison Provides Maryland Customers Programs and Tools to Manage Electric Bills

headline: Advanced LiDAR Technology Being Used to Enhance Vegetation Management Across FirstEnergy's Footprint
summary: Advanced Light Detection and Ranging (LiDAR) technology has been deployed across FirstEnergy Corp.'s (NYSE: FE) service area to more effectively manage hard-to-reach trees and vegetation along 7,100 miles of high-voltage power lines. The work began this month and will continue through the fall.

raw.headline: Advanced LiDAR Technology Being Used to Enhance Vegetation Management Across FirstEnergy's Footprint

headline: FirstEnergy Names Michael Auseré Vice President, Financial Planning and Analysis
summary: FirstEnergy Corp. (NYSE: FE) announced today that Michael Auseré has been named Vice President, Financial Planning and Analysis, effective June 2.

headline: FirstEnergy Names Tabrina L. Davis Vice President, Communications
summary: FirstEnergy Corp. (NYSE: FE) announced today that Tabrina L. Davis has been named Vice President, Communications, effective May 19.
